title: Lenovo Tab M10 (HD) 2 GB RAM 32 GB ROM 10.1 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Slate Black)

product_specification.Additional Features: 2 x Front Facing Speakers with Dolby Audio, Unlock with Face Recognition, FM Radio
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter, Micro USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Auto Focus Rear and Fixed Front Camera
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Wi-Fi Direct, Bluetooth Support, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz Dual Band Wireless Connectivity
product_specification.Other Display Features: HD LED Backlit Multi Touch IPS Display (Color Gamut: 70%, Brightness: 300 nits)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Fast Processing: This tab makes use of the Qualcomm Snapdragon quad-core 2.0 GHz chip to give you fast processing performance. This way, you can enjoy lag-free use.
product_description.Strong Connection: Thanks to the WLAN 802.11a/b/g/n/ ac support, you can enjoy fast and strong Wi-Fi connectivity so that you can game, stream movies, and do more with ease.
product_description.Dual Front-facing Speakers: With this tab, you can enjoy a booming surround sound experience as it is equipped with dual front speakers and the Dolby Audio technology.
product_description.Kids Mode: This tab comes with a kids mode that helps you customise the content for your child. You can protect their usage with the specialised parent control and eye protection mode.
product_description.Facial Recognition: You can conveniently unlock this device in a jiffy, thanks to its facial recognition technology.

review:
Its amazing with the price tag being very minimal. My sister bought the FHD M10 so the physical expectation was already satisfied. I had doubts about the graphic since I will be getting the M10 (HD), but to my surprise the performance is awesomely good. I guess the only difference with the FHD will be picture and visual reproduction is a bit lower. Hardware performance is the same and I'm glad I purchased this terrific tablet. Battery backup is amazing. My 5 years old son uses the tablet for ...
READ MORE

okay so I have been using this for more than 2weeks. I have installed pubg, temple run, score hero, adventure island.. All game were working good except the pubg, (not so smooth, I don't expect also in 430snapdragon😄)! so I uninstalled temple run and then play the other games, trust me It got hang sometimes! in the middle of the Instagram, word, powerpoint, & in the middle of other game also(When network is on) ! but all games are running smoothly when I'm playing (not the pubg, slow movement).. I have 16 .8gb out of 32gb but still it got hang.. so I would say performance could have be better! I'm only happy with the battery back-up 🙂 except this, it's a very simple TAB. Don't expect too much!
I have 1 big complain that is Lenovo should have given atleast 1920*1280 wala aspect ratio screen!
Been using it for 3 days , satisfied till now. Camera is not good enough. Display is quite ok ok. Amazing Dolby sound system. Rest is ok and quite value for money. Screen size is very good .

Average product. I am not so excited after receiving.
From day 1, I feel slowness as I use 6gb ram with mi phone. Battery charging image is attached, it's super slow. This is taken with same charger given in box.
My only concern now, hope it will work fine for online classes, I will install few required application only like google meet, zoom.
I don't expect to play games in it. 3GB ram is decent one, but will update more in future. From ROM, 10GB eaten up by OS. Effectively you get 22GB.
3 out of 5 as on day one. May change in future.

Totally useless product from Lenovo, many of Android App are not computable with it. Don't buy with productivity in mind. It's only good for kids entertainment purpose. Being Android 9 we expect best performance and value for money. But it has tablet version of Android 9 which most of popular app like MyJio etc are computable.
It's the best buy in this range, with plenty of features, gifted it to my dad, he loved it.... 😊

This is a simple tab perfect for online classes, couple of light games and usual surfing on net. If you have any specific need like full time gaming or graphic intensive performance then you need choose something with higher configurations. This is so far the best piece within this budget for all practical and normal needs.
This runs only on wifi and the charging cable (micro USB type) length is too small. These are not the shortcomings but depending on the situation you may become niggling issues. Apart from that all good and worth buying.

The product was too good and I loved it 😊 Thank you ☺️ flipkart... The cost and the maintenance of the product is too good ...but the one thing which I have a problem is the delivery is too late but okk.. Thank you ☺️

Writing this review after 2mths of usage.
Pros: 1. Its big screen. In this price range its really big. Good for these day's online classes and coaching studies.
2. Easy to connect with Wifi and Bluetooth.

Cons: 1. The batrery is too poor and drained so fastt... Should be equipped with a higher capacity battery and fast charging option as it charges very slow.
2. The screen brightness is low, at day light its hard to read and inside house daytime its screen looks so dark and dull.. More bright screen may help the entertainment segment better to enjoy.
3. The processor is super slow and can make u irritate. It hangs sometimes if multiple pages are opend. This device really lags a fast processor which should help a fast hasle free operating system.
4. Camera is below average. Though no lag in online classes and all. But could be more dynamic.
5. Sound out put is also below average. Speaker volumes are not enough loud.

This device has only advantages of a biggeeerr screen. So any one looking for a bigger screen can check it, or else its a super slow product, which feels outdated.. For routine online classes its ok type, but for other entertainment purpose its not recommendable.
Thank you

Super for online classes It has 1 year warranty and slim best for children it has kids mode and easy for sharing the first tab I bought is the best tab I bought in this budget this is a budget tab and looks like it it's a premium tab

Its amazing with the price tag being very minimal. My sister bought the FHD M10 so the physical expectation was already satisfied. I had doubts about the graphic since I will be getting the M10 (HD), but to my surprise the performance is awesomely good. I guess the only difference with the FHD will be picture and visual reproduction is a bit lower. Hardware performance is the same and I'm glad I purchased this terrific tablet. Battery backup is amazing. My 5 years old son uses the tablet for a full day on a single charge.

okay so I have been using this for more than 2weeks. I have installed pubg, temple run, score hero, adventure island.. All game were working good except the pubg, (not so smooth, I don't expect also in 430snapdragon😄)! so I uninstalled temple run and then play the other games, trust me It got hang sometimes! in the middle of the Instagram, word, powerpoint, & in the middle of other game also(When network is on) ! but all games are running smoothly when I'm playing (not the pubg, slow movement).. I have 16 .8gb out of 32gb but still it got hang.. so I would say performance could have be better! I'm only happy with the battery back-up 🙂 except this, it's a very simple TAB. Don't expect too much!
I have 1 big complain that is Lenovo should have given atleast 1920*1280 wala aspect ratio screen!
Been using it for 3 days , satisfied till now. Camera is not good enough. Display is quite ok ok. Amazing Dolby sound system. Rest is ok and quite value for money. Screen size is very good .

My only concern now, hope it will work fine for online classes, I will install few required application only like google meet, zoom.
I don't expect to play games in it. 3GB ram is decent one, but will update more in future. From ROM, 10GB eaten up by OS. Effectively you get 22GB.
3 out of 5 as on day one. May change in future.

*****Mic quality is good.

****Android 10 as stock os. l am waiting to see if it will get Android 11 upgrade.
***Battery drains off after 4-5 hours of online classes with video
****Battery reaches 99% and the last 1% takes about 10mins or so to reach full charge.
*****No issues with Wifi
*****Display & tocuh ok for the price and specs.

After using 6 months I am giving this review,
Discharges fastly if speakers are used , With headset it lasts longer.
Charging is good only with original charger, with others it's taking more time.
Camera is good for online classes.
I have got 4 system updates till now.
When it discharges below 10% of charging it slowdowns drastically.
If we use kids mode or multiple persons mode it keeps stopping.
Speakers are superb.
I have used extra tempered glass because original screen gets scratches easily.
There's also PC mode in this .
But there are issues in connecting with laptop and computer...
Finally it is best option at this range .

I choosed to buy this product after seeing the review comments from others. But did not find anything exciting about it.
1) On the date of delivery , received a message that it will be delivered in next 1 to 3 days. Had plans to give it to my daugher on her birthday, which did not go as planned.
2) Once after initial settings were completed. Tab showed some android system failure twice in 2 days, after it was reset to factory settings on second day, it seems to be working fine till now(another 3 -4 days of buying).
3) I raised a request for replacement, but after talking to them for many times, I understood I am wasting my time.
4) Tab takes 4 hrs at least for full charge with the charger provided.
5) You can create multiple profiles in the tab, I created one for my 7 year old daughter. It have really limited functionality and applications that she rejected it in no time.
6) Tab is really slow, hangs at times
6) Many more to discover...
